transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Haan ji Mohan ji baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan, Kirti Automation?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Haan, actually sir IndiaMART par aapka jo buylead aap kam use kar rahe the sir. Bahut dino se aapko call kar rahe the.
Customer: Kis cheez ka?
Executive: IndiaMART mein jo buylead aa rahi hai, queries aa rahi hai, aapka customer jo aap bahut kam istemal kar rahe ho service ko. Aap Biomass pehle koi deal karte the na laser?
Customer: Biomass pehle to hamare bahut hai madam.
Executive: Bricks bhi hai, hai na?
Customer: Hello, haan ji.
Executive: Hello. Accha accha.
Customer: Ek second ruko. Ek second hold rakhiye madam.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: 4425.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan sir.
Executive: Haan ji madam. To mera yahi kehna tha ki agar main aaj ki bhi recent ki bhi lead utha rahi hu na to aapko Gurgaon area se bhi lead aa rakhi hai. Agar pehle aapko near by se focus karna hai to.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: To uski bhi lead aa rakhi hai. Waise aapki requirement kahan ki hai sir?
Customer: Filhal to hum is month mein busy rahenge.
Executive: Filhal month mein?
Customer: Haan, hamara project chal raha hai, kuch project mein sabhi log busy hai.
Executive: Accha. To ye government project hai sir? Nahi normal hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi, government project nahi hai, private hi hai apna companiyon ka.
Executive: Accha accha. To abhi aap jante hai na ek do ek se do mahina hone wala hai service ko. To aap itna acche se use karenge to hi aapko pata padega. Koi customer aapka hua hai sir IndiaMART se?
Customer: Ek bhi nahi hua abhi.
Executive: Haan, fir aapko participate karna hai sir dekhiye. Customer ko follow karna hai na. Calls vgera aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Call aayi ek do baar.
Executive: Haan, kaisi thi calls?
Customer: Aaya tha lekin baat hi nahi ho paati.
Executive: Haan, to reply jyada milta nahi hai.
Customer: Haan, abhi thoda follow karna padta hai, price deni padti hai sir, hai na? Negotiation. Kuch log mana bhi karte hai to multiple rehta hai. Side rehta hai to customer ko thoda sa interact karna padta hai, convince bhi karna rehta hai sir.
Executive: Hai na?
Customer: Hmm. To is hisab se according hota hai. Waise aapke account manager Shreya ji hai. Aapko Shreya ji ne thoda kal aapko call kiya tha na to aapki incoming aayi thi. Call answer nahi hua tha na aapka?
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Haan, to Shreya aap aapne kiya hoga to main nahi pick kar payi thi isliye maine socha aaj aap free hoge morning mein to morning mein laga leti hu. To sir buylead vgera aap check kariye sir tab aapko feedback pata padega. Waise Pan India chahiye sir ki agar local ka chahiye customer?
Customer: Pan India kar sakte hai, koi issue nahi hai.
Executive: Haan, accha order ke hisab se. Haan, customer karna hota hai.
Customer: Ji ji. Aur dusra ye rehta hai na sir customer aapko har tarah ka milta hai. Abhi jaise agar aapka bricks mein kaam nahi hai to kis mein screw vgera mein kaam hai abhi current mein.
Customer: Kya keh rahe hai?
Executive: Abhi aapka current mein LED monitor vgera mein kaam hai sir kis mein kaam hai sir jyada?
Customer: Service mein.
Executive: Matlab aapki multiple. Haan, multiple product hai na sir motors bhi pada hai, devices bhi pada hai.
Customer: Haan, hamara abhi manufacturing ka chal raha hai, conveyor manufacturing hai wo to dala hi nahi hai humne.
Executive: Accha, wo bhi dal jayega.
Customer: Haan, conveyor bhi dal jayega. Conveyor ka hai aur bhi ka kai cheeze aisi jo service hai jaise installation service hai koi bhi system installation hona hai to uska installation karwa denge apne manpower pe hi karate hai hum.
Executive: Conveyor dala hai sir, stainless steel conveyor belt dala hua hai sir.
Customer: Hain?
Executive: Conveyor belt dala hua hai, SS ki conveyor belt.
Customer: Conveyor belt dala hua hai na wo pura hum conveyor system hi bana ke dete hai.
Executive: Accha pura complete kara ke dete hai overall.
Customer: Haan ji. Accha accha. Aur ye apna control panels mein deal karte hai, control panel jo bante hai na.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Unme bhi deal karte hai. Wo bhi khud in house manufacturing hai control panels ka.
Executive: Theek hai sir aapke online buylead vgera check karte ho sir?
Customer: Haan, koi nahi main bata to raha hu na is month mein thoda hum busy rahenge bhai hamara jo chal raha hai project usko kaise chhod sakte hai hum, chhod to nahi sakte na beech mein.
Executive: Haan, baki waiting review ka bhi hai. Koi bhi aati hai lead jati hai to uske liye bhi fir time chahiye hota hai. Bhai uske man lo by the way deal ho bhi jati hai to deal ke sath mein kya hota hai usko deal ke liye fir time bhi chahiye na bhai usko packing ke liye bhi chahiye banda forwarding ke liye bhi chahiye aur bhai lead ke liye bhi special banda chahiye hume.
Customer: To ye project complete ho jata hai uske baad mein fir hum apna karenge baith ke.
Executive: Haan sir dekhiye aisa hai na jitna aap participate karenge aap active rahenge utna hi rehta hai sir. Baki jo aap keh rahe ho na haan latest lead bhi aa rakhi hai sir. To main aapko. Chalo main check karunga lead to waise check karta rehta hu but main call nahi kar pata.
Executive: Wahi karna hai sir thoda follow up hamare yahan dijiye ga. Fir aapka Shreya ko laga lo.
Customer: Hain ji?
Executive: Aapka Shreya aaj ek do customer ko aap call karne ki koshish to karenge na sir?
Customer: Ab to karenge.
Executive: Karenge madam wo bhi.
Executive: Accha accha. Kyunki sir dekhiye do hi customer ke liye waqt nikalna hai jyada nahi hai na sir.
Customer: Koi nahi mera to mahine mein ek deal bhi agar success ho jata hai to bhi mere liye kafi hai.
Executive: Haan to sir uske liye thoda sa kya hai ek hafta aap hafte mein pura nahi to do teen din to dijiye sir tabhi aapko pata padta hai. Aapko account manager bhi allot hai usse bhi aap interact kijiye. Mere sath mujhe bhi bata sakte hai hai na?
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Fir main aapko kab dobara ring kar sakti hu sir aap customer se baat karoge na tabhi aap response bata paoge hai na?
Customer: Hmm. Chalo koi baat nahi madam abhi to main 30 tarikh ke baad mein hi kar payenge isme kuch aur baki main leads vgera check karta rahunga koi mere ko dikha easy sa hai bhai kaam kar sakte hai to number bhi denge.
Executive: Haan, kyunki sir aapko lead aapko weekly milti hai na last se jati hai. Theek hai sir main aapko 30 ke baad hi ring karti hu.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai, thanks.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not actively using IndiaMART buyleads.

- Customer is busy with an ongoing project.

- Customer has not had any successful deals.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the importance of using buyleads.

- Executive offered assistance and follow-up.

- Executive mentioned the account manager is available.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back after the 30th.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, follow up, project, account manager
